markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I top up my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542490721689-How-can-I-top-up-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [How can I withdraw from my GStocks PH Wallet account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210579108633-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-GStocks-PH-Wallet-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Before making a withdrawal from your GStocks PH Wallet to your GCash Wallet, check your [Wallet and Transaction Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits). If you’ve already reached your limit, you won’t be able to withdraw funds.

To withdraw funds from your GStocks PH Wallet, follow these steps:

1. On your GStocks PH dashboard > **AB Capital Securities Inc.**
2. Select **Withdraw**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41091015858969)**

3. Input the amount you want to withdraw and select **Next**
4. Review the amount you want to withdraw and tap **Confirm**

Once you confirm your withdrawal, your funds will be in your GCash wallet within **2-3 banking days**.

To physically withdraw your stock certificates, please reach out to [gcashcs@ABCapital.com.ph](mailto:gcashcs@ABCapital.com.ph).

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I top up my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542490721689)
- [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057)
- [How can I change or cancel my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211092525593)
